name: smnormalize
description: String normalization utilities for Unicode strings

scripts.test: TZ=Etc/UTC ./node_modules/.bin/ts-node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover -e .ts  -x "*.d.ts" -x "*.test.ts" ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report html -- -R test test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.typedoc: ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --name SMNormalize --out docs/ --readme README.md --target ES6 --module commonjs --mode modules src && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run tslint && npm run compile && npm run test

author: Alessandro Segala
